chart.title: Active Radios by Groups
chart.searchTemplate: * sourcetype=anyfi_flow | eval Radio=radio_hwaddr | eval group_list=mvjoin(radio_groups,",") | stats latest(group_list) as Groups by Radio | stats count as Active by Groups

chart.title: Traffic Volume by Radio Groups
chart.searchTemplate: * sourcetype=anyfi_flow | eval Groups=mvjoin(radio_groups,",") | stats sum(down_gb) as Down sum(up_gb) as Up by Groups | eval GB=Up+Down | fields Groups,GB

chart.title: Traffic Volume by Radio
chart.searchTemplate: * sourcetype=anyfi_flow | eval Radio=radio_hwaddr | stats sum(down_gb) as Down sum(up_gb) as Up by Radio | eval GB=Up+Down | sort - GB | fields Radio,GB

table.searchTemplate: * sourcetype=anyfi_flow | eval Radio=radio_hwaddr | stats latest(radio_freq) as freq latest(radio_addr) as "IP" latest(radio_software) as "Software" latest(radio_driver) as "Driver" sum(up_gb) as sum_up_gb sum(down_gb) as sum_down_gb by Radio | eval total_gb=sum_up_gb+sum_down_gb | eval Down=round(sum_down_gb,2) . " GB" | eval Up=round(sum_up_gb,2) . " GB" | eval Channel=freq . " MHz" | sort - total_gb | fields Radio,Channel,IP,Software,Driver,Up,Down
